summary: AFTER SLOWING TO ENTER A DRIVEWAY THE CAR DID NOT RESPOND TO GAS PEDDLE.  IT WOULD GO VERY SLOWLY WHEN THE ACCELERATOR WAS PUSHED.  IT WOULD NOT CORRECT ITSELF AFTER BEING STOPED AND TURNED OFF.  HOWEVER AFTER BEING OFF SOMETIME IT WENT AWAY AND RESPONDED AS USUAL.  WHEN IT WAS TAKEN TO THE SERVICE DEPT. IT DID IT AGAIN BUT LATER THE SERVICE MAN SAID HE COULD NOT DUPLICATE IT, ALTHOUGH HE KNEW THAT IT DID IT ORIGINALLY.
